title: Taking the Train
description: Through the fields, past the towns, over rivers, and on to the big city the train travels. Taking the Train provides students with a detailed look at the experience of riding a train. The book can also be used to teach students to ask and answer questions and to identify the author's purpose.
reviewWords: blows, races, rocks, rolls, track, train
comprehension: Author's Purpose                : Determine the author’s purpose
